name: Ordering System
long_description: Ordering System for a restaurant. It consist of 4 user roles: Admin, Manager, Cashier and Customer, Aims to creates a list of orders to a restaurant through a web system. It also has Point of Sale (POS) with thermal printing for physical transactions and inventory for managing stocks. It has responsive design to be able to be used in any kind of devices like mobile, tablet, laptop, and pc.
higlights: Built and deployed the project from the ground up
Developed Scalable Codebase and Modular Architecture
Deployed the application on IIS, utilizing an in-house server to make it publicly accessible

name: HRdotnet-dayone
long_description: A recruitment system designed to automate the hiring process.
higlights: Built and deployed the project from the ground up
Developed Scalable Codebase and Modular Architecture
Collaborated with the senior developer to ensure code quality and solutions aligned with development standards
Deployed the application on IIS, utilizing an in-house server to make it publicly accessible

name: POS System
long_description: A Point of Sale System designed for retail stores to manage sales transactions,inventory and generate reports.
higlights: Built and deployed the project from the ground up
Developed to be used by retail stores nationwide
Beaureu of Internal Revenue accredited software
Deployed the application on premise server of the client

name: IPPMIS
long_description: Integrated Personnel Payroll Management System designed to automate the employees payroll and provide robust solution to templates.
higlights: Built and deployed the project from the ground up
Developed Scalable Codebase and Modular Architecture
Collaborated with the senior developer to ensure code quality and solutions aligned with development standards
Deployed the application on IIS, utilizing an in-house server to make it publicly accessible

name: Anti Scam App
long_description: An Anti Scam Mobile Application that allows users to live track other users during transactions to ensure legitimacy.
higlights: Used to live track other user to ensure the legitimacy of the transaction
Implemented Firebase Authentication for secure user login and registration
Utilized SupaBase for efficient data storage and retrieval
Integrated Google API for enhanced app functionality

name: KichiEats
higlights: In charge of maintenance and developing new functionalities
Collaborated directly with a Japanese client to ensure tasks were completed based on their requirements
Collaborated with the senior developer to ensure code quality and solutions aligned with development standards
Developed dynamic SEO functionality that adapts to end-user input for a restaurant platform
Utilized a backend deployed on AWS EC2 and a frontend with CI/CD integration

name: ExpenseTracker
long_description: An Expenses Archiving Application that provides users with detailed analytics and insights.
higlights: A blazing-fast frontend capable of handling 100,000+ data entries
Implemented caching with server-side pagination using Zustand and TanStack Query
Implemented authentication and refresh tokens for enhanced security
Adopted a modular project structure and routing to facilitate collaborative development
Utilized Express and Mongoose to build a REST API with integrated Swagger for API docs
Deployed both frontend and backend applications using Vercel for fast and reliable hosting
Containerization using docker for frontend and backend ensuring compatibility to other devices
Utilized TypeScript across the codebase, ensuring type safety and improving maintainability

name: E-Palengke
long_description: Nearby e-commerce geolocation and radius based. It consist of 4 user roles: Admin, Seller, Customer and Delivery. Aims to provide a convenient online shopping experience for homebound individuals, It also provides employment to local residents as foot-based delivery personnel, fostering income generation without any initial investment.
higlights: Implemented Dynamic end-user requirements based on administrator preferences
User role access is stored in the database for code maintainability and future upgrades
Used Laravel Passport for Secure User Authentication
Utilized PusherJS/Websockets for realtime orders
Utilized Laravel Eloquent ORM and Query Builder to enhance queries
Utilized Modern framework advantage to build cross platform development using Ionic/Vue
Implemented Firebase Push Notifications to enhance user convenience while awaiting orders

name: Disaster & Risk
long_description: Realtime Cloud Based Disaster and Risked Geospatial Management System. It consist of 2 user roles: End User and Admin.
higlights: Utilized PusherJS/Websockets for realtime end user report that will reflect in vue leaflet map
Implement customizable icon that can be use in leaflet map pin like fire, traffic, typhoon etc
Utilized Vuetify and CSS for Responsive Web And Mobile Platform

name: Blockchain Voting
long_description: Implementation of Blockchain Technology in Student Council Voting System, I developed the PWA version (in the 'mobile' folder), I set up the backend using Laravel and the blockchain using the test network Ganache.  My case study partner developed the web version, The system consists of two user roles: admin for the web and end user for mobile (PWA).
higlights: Used solidity to create a smart contract for immutable voting
Utilized Ganache test network to store votes on the blockchain
Secured voting results by reading blockchain data and visualizing it with ApexCharts

name: WEBOMS
description: jQuery + Bootstrap + PHP + Java Native Mobile
long_description: Ordering System for a restaurant. It consist of 4 user roles: Admin, Manager, Cashier and Customer, Aims to creates a list of orders to a restaurant through a web system. It also has Point of Sale (POS) with thermal printing for physical transactions and inventory for managing stocks. It has responsive design to be able to be used in any kind of devices like mobile, tablet, laptop, and pc.
higlights: Implemented PHP Mailer OTP to verify user accounts and filter out fake users
Use pie and bar graphs to represent the sales report for daily, weekly, and monthly data
Developed a native mobile app to integrate with the web system for user ordering convenience
Modules includes Inventory, POS, Top-up, Orders, Sales Report, Feedback and User Accounts
Seamless payments by integrating hardware RFID and updating user details in the database

name: Expenses Tracker
long_description: Expenses tracker with Dynamic Analytics of expenses by date and category, it consist of 1 user role: End User
higlights: Used AnyChart for analytics of expenses by category and date using bar and pie graph
Used SQLITE for storing of expenses and category
